channel.title: Runtime error: NoClassDefFoundError
channel.description:
Do you think you can help me? I got my server for InnovationX up, but when I try to run the IX Pro client i get this error: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
Here is what the client run.bat looks like [code]@echo off cd ./bin/ @title InnovationX java -Xmx1024m client 0 highmem pause[/code]

item.title: Runtime error: NoClassDefFoundError
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

4. Excessive spamming or flaming, as a rule of thumb, will result in one to two week warnings or moderations. Repetitive excessive flaming will result in worse punishments. This means, the more posts full of excessive flaming there are in the topics, the worse each punishment will be individually. Same applies to spamming.
  1. Make sure the titles of your topics are easy to read and are completely relevant to the topic at hand. Though this rule may be bent from time to time, make sure you follow it. A moderator on a bad day could easily lock a topic for breaking this rule.

item.title: Runtime error: NoClassDefFoundError
item.dc:creator: @WoodcutGuy WoodcutGuy
item.description:
@WoodcutGuy wrote:

Do you think you can help me? I got my server for InnovationX up, but when I try to run the IX Pro client i get this error:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

Here is what the client run.bat looks like

@echo off cd ./bin/ @title InnovationX java -Xmx1024m client 0 highmem pause

Read full topic
